Text: Thanks mr jormis for all your very rare and nice comics...i noticed you have an interest in the Vertigo crime label, pls upload "99 days". Thank u in advance

And the last but not least the last of the comic crew, I beg of you to let me know if you can locate or upload, Batgirl Vol. 1 and 2 or Robin and Red Robin collections. Anything will do, appreciation is given.
I'm the author of this book and I make a living off of book sales...I won't be able to afford to live, write, and draw books if you continue to share them for free.
